mapper.select: SELECT TRAVELNO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITEDATE, ID, NAME FROM TRAVEL where id=#{id} order by travelNO desc
SELECT TRAVELNO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITEDATE, ID, NAME FROM TRAVEL ORDER BY TRAVELNO DESC
SELECT TRAVELNO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITEDATE, ID, NAME FROM TRAVEL WHERE travelNO=#{travelNO}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TRAVEL (TRAVELNO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITEDATE, ID, NAME) VALUES((SELECT nvl(MAX(TRAVELNO) ,0)+1 FROM TRAVEL), #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE, #{id}, #{name})
mapper.update: UPDATE TRAVEL SET TITLE=#{title}, CONTENT=#{content} WHERE travelNO=#{travelNO}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TRAVEL t ,IMAGE i,CATEGORY c WHERE t.TRAVELNO = i.TRAVELNO(+) AND t.TRAVELNO = c.TRAVELNO (+) ORDER BY t.TRAVELNO DESC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER()over(ORDER BY travelNO DESC) count,travelNO, title,content,writeDate,id, name FROM TRAVEL ) t, IMAGE i,CATEGORY c WHERE t.TRAVELNO = i.TRAVELNO(+) AND t.TRAVELNO = c.TRAVELNO (+) AND t.count BETWEEN #{startPage} AND #{endPage}
SELECT * FROM TRAVEL t ,IMAGE i,CATEGORY c WHERE t.TRAVELNO = i.TRAVELNO(+) AND t.TRAVELNO = c.TRAVELNO (+) AND c.CATEGORYNAME = #{key} ORDER BY t.TRAVELNO DESC
